segments.text: Why do you change your job and apply for a translator ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This job is more challenging and I have longed to be a translator . That â€™ s why I came here for an interview .

segments.text: What do you think are the capacities for a success as a translator ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think one needs common knowledge , specific knowledge , and professional codes to be a successful translator .
segments.speaker: S2
